title: Alejandro Paul
content:
**[Indices](http://web.archive.org/web/20140809044807/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Indices) : [Designers](http://web.archive.org/web/20140809044807/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Designers) : Alejandro Paul**

Graphic and Type designer  
b.1972, Argentina

[http://www.sudtipos.com](http://web.archive.org/web/20140809044807/http:/www.sudtipos.com/ "http://www.sudtipos.com")

You can also see other work by Alejandro's at [Veer](http://web.archive.org/web/20140809044807/http:/www.veer.com/products/vendor.aspx?vendor=umt).
